attributes.additional_details:
Nedge Farm riding centre is under pressure from housing development plans that could lead to the closure of the Riding School.

The Centre acts not only as a recreational function, but also a social hub where adults and children of all ages are able to feel comfortable and content in a family environment.

Were the plans to go ahead, acres of land would be lost, many horses would have to be relocated and a business that has played an imperative part in the economic infrastructure of Telfords equine community   could potentially be lost.

Please sign the petition against the development.
